channel.title: Despretly Need help!
channel.description:
Hey guys i'm having some major trouble for ex.
1.) whenever i log on and play for about 10 min it all of a sudden says "connection lost" and kicks me out and wont let me log back in because it keeps on saying connection lost and kicks me
2.) i need some help with private servers if someone could give me a full explanation on how to play on someone elses server that'd b good.... for ex. i see the ip the port, and the pass on a forum so i go to moparscape enter the new ip and enter the new port (under file) once i'v done that i enter my username & pw and it wont let me in (if u could tell me how to do it with "poopscapepkz" that'd b really helpful thnx)
i know your thinking that im a waste of time and im so retarted and stuff but if you could help me i'd be really thankful.
my Aim is soccerplayer5242 so u can talk to me there if u want but anyways thanks alot if u do help
and whats hamachi? :P so nooby

Hey guys i’m having some major trouble for ex.

1.) whenever i log on and play for about 10 min it all of a sudden says “connection lost” and kicks me out and wont let me log back in because it keeps on saying connection lost and kicks me

2.) i need some help with private servers if someone could give me a full explanation on how to play on someone elses server that’d b good…
